product_name: REI Travel Day Bag - Special Buy
long_description: The REI Travel Day Bag is thoughtfully designed to keep your travel essentials organized. Zippered front compartment features key fob and organizer panel for cards and coins; front flap features a zippered pocket sized for a passport. 2 quick-access front pockets let you stash glasses and a compact camera or MP3 player; also features a handy interior pen pocket. Zippered main compartment is roomy enough to stash a book and light jacket. Back panel pocket keeps map or boarding pass within easy reach. 1-inch webbing shoulder strap adjusts for the right fit. Special buy.
short_description: The REI Travel Day Bag is thoughtfully designed to keep your travel essentials organized.
